LanguageData.TinyTweaks.StartupSettingsNote: Note: Game restart required in order for any changes to these settings to take effect.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.ChangeDefLabels_ToolTip: When enabled, the labels of things such as items and recipe bills will be cased just like vanilla (e.g. White Composite Water Tower => White composite water tower).
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.ChangeBuildableDefDesignation: When enabled, certain architect menu tabs from certain mods will be merged with vanilla architect tabs (e.g. 'Furniture+' from More Furniture merged into 'Furniture'). In some cases, new architect tabs may be added too (e.g. buildings from LWM Deep Storage will get their own 'Storage' tab).
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.GeneralSettingsNote: Note: Changes made to these settings will be applied instantly - a game restart is not required.
LanguageData.TinyTweaks.ArtilleryCopyPasteGizmos_Tool: When enabled, artillery (e.g. mortars) will have copy/paste storage settings buttons just like stockpiles. Allows for easy bulk changing of shells to use.
